titleInfo.title: Coll 29/115(1) 'Provision of vehicles for the Shaikhdoms'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 25; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the supply of cars and lorries for Bahrain, Kuwait and Persian Gulf shaikhdoms.The file contains correspondence between the Government of India, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, the Secretary of State for India, the Ministry of War Transports, and the Political Adviser to the Government of Bahrain.
